name: RemoteObjectController
description: Use RemoteObjectController to access the standard Visualforce Remote Objects operations in your Remote Objects override methods.

create(string,map<string,object>).name: create
create(string,map<string,object>).signature: public static Map<String,Object> create(String type, Map<String,Object> fields)
create(string,map<string,object>).overrideSignature: public static override Map<String,Object> create(String type, Map<String,Object> fields)
create(string,map<string,object>).description: Create a record in the database.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The sObject type on which create is being called. The fields and values to set on the new record.

del(string,list<string>).name: del
del(string,list<string>).signature: public static Map<String,Object> del(String type, List<String> recordIds)
del(string,list<string>).overrideSignature: public static override Map<String,Object> del(String type, List<String> recordIds)

recordids.name: recordIds
recordids.description: The sObject type on which delete is being called. The IDs of the records to be deleted.

retrieve(string,list<string>,map<string,.name: retrieve
retrieve(string,list<string>,map<string,.signature: public static Map<String,Object> retrieve(String type, List<String> fields, Map<String,Object> criteria)
retrieve(string,list<string>,map<string,.overrideSignature: public static override Map<String,Object> retrieve(String type, List<String> fields, Map<String,Object> criteria)

criteria.name: criteria
criteria.description: The sObject type on which retrieve is being called. The fields to retrieve for each record. The criteria to use when performing the query.

updat(string,list<string>,map<string,obj.name: updat
updat(string,list<string>,map<string,obj.signature: public static Map<String,Object> updat(String type, List<String> recordIds, Map<String,Object> fields)
updat(string,list<string>,map<string,obj.overrideSignature: public static override Map<String,Object> updat(String type, List<String> recordIds, Map<String,Object> fields)

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The sObject type on which update is being called. The IDs of the records to be updated. The fields to update, and the value to update each field with.
